colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES PA CI MANG 'DREN ZHING DPAL LDAN SA GSUM MA'I MJUG TU GSOL 'DEBS BTON KYANG 'THUS, YANG NA DPAL LDAN SA GSUM MA RDZOGS NAS MKHAS GRUB RIN PO CHE'I GSOL 'DEBS BTON RJES SMON LAM 'DI KHA BTAB KYANG 'THUS PA NI GONG DU NYER BSDU RANG @007B LA RGYAS PA'I MKHAS GRUB RJE RANG LA ZHUGS PA YIN PAS KHYAD MED PHEBS BYUNG, ,SMON LAM 'DI DKA' DRIN GSUM LDAN PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN GZIGS CHEN PO RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I BKA' RGYA MA YIN, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
